cn.title: 【比特派】关于派银行停止 Omni 格式 USDT 充提功能的公告

message.data: 为了给用户提供更流畅的体验，比特派将于2021年04月30日08:00（香港时间）停止 Omni USDT 的币币兑换、矿工费加油包、派银行充值、提现业务。 钱包内收发不受影响。请您提前做好相关规划，感谢您的理解与支持。
如果您在提现关闭后仍然有 USDT-Omni 留在派银行，可以通过升级比特派钱包至最新版，直接提现 USDT-trc20 或 USDT-erc20 解决。
感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持。

en.title: Announcement on suspension of the USDT-Omni deposit and withdrawal of Pie Bank

message.data: In order to improve user experience, Bitpie will stop USDT-Omni's Coin Swap, Miner fee packages, and deposit and withdrawal services of Pie Bank at 08:00 (UTC+8) on April 30, 2021. Sending and receiving in the wallet will not be affected. Please make relevant plans in advance, thank you for your understanding and support.
If you still have USDT-Omni in Pie Bank after the withdrawal is closed, you can directly withdraw USDT-TRC20 or USDT-ERC20 by upgrading the Bitpie wallet to the latest version.
